about.hero_desc: Welcome to our creative workshop, where every book becomes a unique work of art, crafted for eternity.
about.story_lead: Tsuky Tales was born from a burning passion for the book as an object and the desire to honour the stories that move us.
about.story_p1: We are an independent publisher specialising in limited collector editions. Our mission is simple: to transform your favourite novels into true library treasures.
about.story_p2: Thanks to unique artisanal expertise in France, we work every detail — from the cover to the edge painting — to offer readers an unprecedented sensory and emotional experience.
about.value_design_text: Original covers crafted with renowned illustrators to capture the soul of each story.
about.value_jaspage_text: Hand-illustrated edges that make each copy a one-of-a-kind collector's item.
about.value_quality_text: Hot foil stamping, selective varnish and premium papers for timeless beauty and durability.
about.vision_quote: We believe every great story deserves a case worthy of its brilliance. We create lasting memories you'll be proud to pass on.

subscription.hero_subtitle: Choose the experience that suits you and receive the magic of Tsuky Tales at your door.
subscription.card_sub_desc: RECEIVE YOUR EXCLUSIVE BOX EVERY QUARTER
subscription.preorder_desc: RESERVE YOUR COPY OF THE NEXT LIMITED EDITION

seo.home_description: Unique illustrated books and literary subscriptions. Tsuky Tales awakens the imagination of children and adults alike.
seo.about_description: Discover the story of Tsuky Tales, the passionate publisher creating collector editions and unique literary boxes.
seo.subscription_description: Subscribe to the Tsuky Tales literary box. Monthly and quarterly plans with collector books and exclusive editions delivered to your door.
seo.contact_description: Get in touch with the Tsuky Tales team. Questions, suggestions or partnership ideas? We'd love to hear from you.
seo.branding_description: Tsuky Tales brand kit — banners, visual resources and brand identity.
seo.cart_description: Review your cart and proceed to checkout.
seo.terms_description: Read the Tsuky Tales terms and conditions: orders, delivery, returns and refunds.
seo.legal_description: Legal notice for the Tsuky Tales website: publisher, host, intellectual property and liability.
seo.privacy_description: Learn how Tsuky Tales collects, uses and protects your personal data in compliance with the GDPR.

terms.title: Terms &
terms.section_1_text: These Terms and Conditions govern all sales of products and services offered by TSUKY TALES on tsukytales.com. Placing an order implies full and unreserved acceptance of these Terms.
terms.section_2_text:
TSUKY TALES — SASU (simplified single-shareholder company) with a share capital of €10,000
Registered office: 60 rue François Ier, 75008 Paris, France
SIREN: 999 793 193 — RCS Paris
Intra-community VAT: FR08999793193
Email: contact@tsukytales.com
terms.section_3_text: Tsuky Tales sells books, collector editions, literary boxes and related merchandise, as well as subscription plans (quarterly, annual). Products are described and presented as accurately as possible. Photographs are not contractually binding.
terms.section_4_text: Prices are displayed in euros including all applicable taxes. Shipping costs are calculated based on the chosen delivery method and communicated before order confirmation. Tsuky Tales reserves the right to modify its prices at any time; products are invoiced at the price in effect at the time of the order.
terms.section_5_text: An order is confirmed once payment has been validated. A confirmation email is sent to the address provided by the customer. Tsuky Tales reserves the right to cancel any order in the event of a payment issue, incorrect address, or any other legitimate reason.
terms.section_6_text: Payment is made online by credit card through the secure Stripe platform. The amount is charged at the time of order confirmation. For subscriptions, payment is automatically debited at each billing date according to the chosen plan.
terms.section_7_text: Orders are shipped to the address provided during checkout. Delivery times are given as estimates. Tsuky Tales cannot be held responsible for delays attributable to the carrier. Available delivery methods include home delivery and relay point (Mondial Relay).
terms.section_8_text: In accordance with French Consumer Code Article L221-18, the customer has 14 days from receipt of the product to exercise their right of withdrawal without having to provide a reason. The product must be returned in its original and complete condition. Return shipping costs are the customer's responsibility. Refunds will be issued within 14 days of receiving the returned product.
terms.section_9_text: All products benefit from the legal conformity guarantee (French Consumer Code Articles L217-4 to L217-14) and the guarantee against hidden defects (French Civil Code Articles 1641 to 1649). In case of a defective or non-conforming product, the customer may contact customer service for an exchange or refund.
terms.section_10_text: Subscriptions are automatically renewed at each billing date. The customer may cancel their subscription at any time from their account dashboard. Cancellation takes effect at the end of the current period. No refund will be issued for the current period already in progress. A skip pass may be used once per year to skip a billing cycle.
terms.section_11_text: All content on the website (text, images, illustrations, logos) is the exclusive property of Tsuky Tales or its partners. Any reproduction, representation, or exploitation, even partial, without prior written authorisation is prohibited.
terms.section_12_text: Personal data collected is processed in accordance with our Privacy Policy and the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). For more information, please refer to our dedicated page.
terms.section_13_text: These Terms are governed by French law. In the event of a dispute, the parties will endeavour to reach an amicable resolution. Failing that, the dispute will be submitted to the competent courts of Paris. In accordance with French Consumer Code Article L612-1, the customer may freely use a consumer mediator.
terms.section_14_text: Pre-order products are charged at the time of order. The estimated delivery date is displayed on the product page. Tsuky Tales commits to informing the customer of any significant delay. The right of withdrawal applies from the date of actual receipt of the product.

legal.section_3_text: All content on tsukytales.com (text, images, illustrations, logos, graphics, icons, videos, sounds) is the exclusive property of Tsuky Tales or its partners and is protected by French and international intellectual property laws. Any reproduction, representation, modification, publication, or adaptation of these elements, in whole or in part, by any means or process, is prohibited without prior written authorisation from Tsuky Tales.
legal.section_4_text: Tsuky Tales strives to ensure the accuracy and timeliness of the information published on the website. However, Tsuky Tales cannot guarantee the accuracy, precision, or completeness of the information. Tsuky Tales disclaims all liability for any damage resulting from fraudulent third-party intrusion, inability to access the website, or any force majeure event.
legal.section_5_text: The website may contain links to third-party sites. Tsuky Tales has no control over these sites and disclaims all responsibility for their content and privacy policies.
legal.section_6_text: For all information regarding the processing of your personal data, please refer to our Privacy Policy.
legal.section_7_text: The website uses strictly necessary cookies for the proper functioning of the service (session, authentication, cart). No advertising or tracking cookies are placed without the user's prior consent.
legal.section_8_text: These legal notices are governed by French law. Any dispute relating to their interpretation or execution falls under the jurisdiction of the courts of Paris.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.intro: Tsuky Tales (SASU, 60 rue François Ier, 75008 Paris, France) is committed to protecting the privacy of its users. This policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal data in compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
privacy.section_1_text:
The data controller is:
TSUKY TALES — SASU
60 rue François Ier, 75008 Paris, France
Email: contact@tsukytales.com
privacy.section_2_text:
We collect the following data:
• Identification data: surname, first name, email address
• Delivery data: postal address, phone number
• Payment data: processed directly by Stripe (we do not store your banking information)
• Browsing data: strictly necessary cookies
• Order data: purchase history, subscriptions
privacy.section_3_text:
Your data is used for:
• Managing and processing your orders
• Managing your customer account
• Managing your subscription
• Sending order confirmations and delivery notifications
• Processing your contact requests
• Complying with our legal and accounting obligations
privacy.section_4_text:
The processing of your data is based on:
• Performance of a contract (orders, subscriptions)
• Your consent (contact form)
• Our legitimate interest (service improvement)
• Our legal obligations (invoicing, accounting)
privacy.section_5_text:
Your data may be shared with:
• Stripe: payment processing
• Boxtal / Mondial Relay: order shipment
• Our hosting provider (OVH): website hosting
• Our email service providers

No data is sold to third parties for commercial purposes.
privacy.section_6_text:
Your data is retained for:
• Account data: lifetime of the account + 3 years after deletion
• Order data: 10 years (accounting obligations)
• Contact data: 3 years after the last contact
• Cookies: 13 months maximum
privacy.section_7_text:
Under the GDPR, you have the following rights:
• Right of access: obtain a copy of your data
• Right of rectification: correct inaccurate data
• Right to erasure: request deletion of your data
• Right to portability: receive your data in a structured format
• Right to object: object to the processing of your data
• Right to restriction: restrict the processing of your data

To exercise these rights, contact us at: contact@tsukytales.com
privacy.section_8_text: We implement appropriate technical and organisational measures to protect your data: SSL/TLS encryption, restricted access, secure payments via Stripe, regular backups.
privacy.section_9_text:
The website only uses strictly necessary cookies for the service:
• Session cookie (authentication)
• Cart cookie
• Language preference cookie

No advertising or analytics cookies are placed without your consent.
privacy.section_10_text:
If you believe that the processing of your data does not comply with regulations, you may file a complaint with the CNIL:
Commission Nationale de l'Informatique et des Libertés
3 place de Fontenoy, TSA 80715
75334 Paris Cedex 07, France
https://www.cnil.fr

branding.title: Tsuky Tales Brand Kit
branding.subtitle: Visual resources and brand identity
branding.about_text: Tsuky Tales is an independent French publisher built on one passion: creating illustrated books that spark the imagination. Each work is designed as a doorway to a unique universe, where words and images intertwine to transport readers — young and old — into extraordinary adventures. Our mission is to cultivate curiosity, nurture dreams, and deliver unforgettable reading experiences. From the first sketch to the final print, every book carries the soul of its creators and the ambition to touch the hearts of those who discover it.
branding.banners_subtitle: Download our banners in standard sizes or customize the dimensions
branding.resize_hint: Drag the bottom-right corner to resize
